original_text: I arrived at the town well today. I prayed, “ Lord, God of my master Abraham, please help me to find a wife for my master's son. This is why I have travelled here.
korean_text: 내가 오늘 우물에 이르러 말하기를 내 주인 아브라함의 하나님 여호와여 만일 내가 행하는 길에 형통함을 주실진대

sentences.original_text: I arrived at the town well today
Lord, God of my master Abraham
please help me to find a wife
This is why I have travelled here
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 내가 여기까지 여행 온 이유이다
